A Swift Pair of Messengers

Bhikkhu Sujato

Calm with insight in the Buddha's words.

A Swift Pair of Messengers clears up any confusion for meditators trying to understand the use of samatha (calm) and vipassana (insight) meditation practices as taught in the early Buddhist suttas.

Bones Tote

Support the production and free distribution of wonderful dhamma texts such as Venerable Sujato's A Swift Pair of Messengers AND carry your impermanent worldy possessions as you wander through samsara.

“Bhikkhus, the skeletons of a single person, running on and wandering in saṃsāra for an aeon, would make a heap of bones, a quantity of bones as large as this Mount Vepulla, if there were someone to collect them and if the collection were not destroyed.” —Itivuttaka 24
